markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gunslinger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3215) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Gunslinger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=114)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 14

</column>

---

You become trained in simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms. You become trained in gunslinger class DC.

 Choose a gunslinger [way](/classes/gunslinger/ways). You become trained in your way's associated skill; if you were already trained in this skill, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of way.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the gunslinger archetype.

<title level="2">Gunslinger Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Shooting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3216), [Eagle Eye](/Feats.aspx?ID=3220), [Firearm Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=3221), [Practiced Reloads](/Feats.aspx?ID=3219), [Slinger's Readiness](/Feats.aspx?ID=3218)
name: Gunslinger Dedication
